title: Juggernauts can still stack 6 health items and assassinate squishies if they get in melee range
body:
4k health assassins are balanced because they are melee though xd.

Actually scratch the squishy part, they assassnate anyone also not stacking hp with their true damage.

''But they are weak to being kited in 1v5's so they are fine'', Stacking health and defensive items and outdamaging glass cannons is clearly healthy game design.
